title: Are these the most ridiculous The Masked Singer Australia guesses EVER?
text:
The Masked Singer Australia unmasked it's latest celebrity on Sunday night, with actor and TV host Darren McMullen revealed to be inside the Prawn costume.

But fans at home were more shocked by some of the guesses being made by the judges over the course of the night.

Big names like Bruno Mars, Tyra Banks and Liam Payne were thrown around, leaving many taking to Twitter to mock the punts.

Scroll down for video

Are these the most ridiculous The Masked Singer Australia guesses ever? Fans mocked the judges after they suggested Bruno Mars, Tyra Banks or Liam Payne are inside the costumes. Pictured: Bruno Mars, believed by the judges to be the Robot

When comedian Dave Hughes suggested that Bruno Mars may be inside the Robot costume, many were amused.

One person Tweeted: 'Wtf Hughesy! As if the budget on this show could afford Bruno Mars'.

Another viewer at home chimed in sarcastically: 'Bahahaha Bruno Mars. David.'

Jackie 'O' Henderson's guess of Niall Horan, and Dannii Minogue's guess of Liam Payne, both from pop super group One Direction, were equally derided.

Not convinced! Fans at home were more shocked by some of the guesses being made by the judges over the course of the night

One fan Tweeted: 'HAHAHAHAAHA they think the robot is Niall or Liam, what a p*sser'.

Another said: 'Clearly no ones ever heard @BrunoMars @LiamPayne or @NiallOfficial sing... lmao'.

Lindsay Lohan's guesses of Aaron Carter for the Robot and Redfoo for the Prawn were critiqued.

Nope? When judge Lindsay Lohan (pictured) guessed supermodel Tyra Banks for the Lion, fans were entertained

One person Tweeted: 'Lindsay: Maybe Tyra Banks... Can someone inform Lindsay of the budget of this show'. Pictured left: Tyra Banks and right, the Lion

Someone Tweeted: 'Lindsay has guessed Redfoo and Aaron Carter tonight, looks like she's officially run out of Aussie celebs!'

Likewise when the American actress guessed supermodel Tyra Banks for the Lion, fans were entertained.

One person Tweeted: 'Lindsay: Maybe Tyra Banks... Can someone inform Lindsay of the budget of this show'.

Who is he? Two of the judges thought the Robot could be a member of One Direction

Not this direction? Jackie 'O' Henderson's guess of Niall Horan (left), and Dannii Minogue's guess of Liam Payne (right) , both from pop super group One Direction, for the Robot, were equally derided

Someone Tweeted: 'Lindsay has guessed Redfoo and Aaron Carter tonight, looks like she's officially run out of Aussie celebs!' Pictured: Aaron Carter

Another joined in sarcastically, saying: 'Yes, it's Tyra Banks. Jesus.'

Some fans feel the judges are making outlandish guesses to throw viewers off from the true identities.

One person Tweeted: 'Omg it’s so so weird that the prawn was Darren McMullen, an average Australian TV personality and not like, John Legend.'

They added: 'STOP PRETENDING IT WILL BE ANY OTHER WAY CHANNEL 10'.
description: The Masked Singer Australia unmasked it's latest celebrity on Sunday night, with actor and TV host Darren McMullen revealed to be inside the Prawn costume.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
